job.name: Wanted
job.description: You see a familiar name on the bounty board. Their misfortune could literally be your fortune.
job.destination: A space containing another player that has at least 1 [Negative] reputation.
job.encounter: Resolve a combat against that player. If you win, claim this reward.
job.reward: If you won combat against a player who has more fame than you, gain [Credits]5,000 and 2 fame. Otherwise, gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 fame. Then discard this card.

job.name: Wanted
job.description: You see a familiar name on the bounty board. It seems that they have crossed the wrong people.
job.destination: A space containing another player that has at least 1 [Negative] reputation.
job.encounter: Resolve a combat against that player. If you win, claim this reward.
job.reward: If you won combat against a player who has more fame than you, gain [Credits]5,000 and 2 fame. Otherwise, gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 fame. Then discard this card.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver 4-LOM's token to Tatooine to gain [Credits]10,000 and 2 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver BoShek's token to Nal Hutta to gain [Credits]8,000 and 2 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Chrewbacca's token to the Ring of Kafrene to gain [Credits]18,000 and 2 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Garindan's token to Kessel to gain [Credits]7,000, 2 fame, and 1 Rebel reputation.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card lose 1 Imperial reputation and remove this card from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Greedo's token to Ord Mantell to gain [Credits]9,000, 2 fame, and 1 Syndicate reputation.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, lose 1 /Hutt reputation and remove this card from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Hera Syndulla's token to Lothal to gain [Credits]15,000, 2 fame, and 1 Imperial Reputation.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, lose 1 Rebel reputation and remove this card from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Maz Kanata's token to Naboo to gain [Credits]15,000 and 2 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Saw Gerrera's token to Lothal to gain [Credits]17,000, 2 fame, and 1 Imperial reputation.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from thsi card, remove it from the game.

bounty.capture_reward: Deliver Ziton Moj's token to the Ring of Kafrene to gain [Credits]16,000 and 2 fame.
bounty.notes: After you gain a reward from this card, lose 1 Syndicate reputation and remove this card from the game.
